00227 #define LOG_MESSAGE(expression, level) \
00228         try { \
00229                 std::ostringstream tmp_log_output_stream;\
00230                 tmp_log_output_stream << expression;\
00231                 log::add_message(tmp_log_output_stream, level);\
00232         } catch (...) {}
00233         
00234 
00238 #define LOG_FATAL(e) LOG_MESSAGE(e, log::fatal)
00239 
00243 #define LOG_ERROR(e) LOG_MESSAGE(e, log::error)
00244

00249
